doc.title: Welt/Zeit 25812 min
doc.plot: Vienna, Singapore, Hong Kong, Taipei, Tokyo, Kyoto, Los Angeles, New York, Vienna. On an eighteen-day round-the-world-trip, the camera made one picture every minute. During the day, during the night, in suitcases, in the airplane, train, bus and hotel room ... 25812 pictures round the world. A film document of world/time.
